story_parts.text: One day, a lion was walking through the jungle and came across a city. He had never seen a city before and was curious to explore it. The lion walked through the streets, looking at all the tall buildings and busy people. He even saw a few other lions and tigers walking around. The lion thought the city was amazing and he loved it.
next_options: The lion continues to explore the city and eventually makes a home there
The lion gets scared by all the people and runs away
story_parts.selected_option: The lion continues to explore the city and eventually makes a home there

story_parts.text: The lion continues to explore the city and eventually makes a home there. He loves all the sights and sounds of the city and enjoys being around all the people. The lion is happy to have found a new home and is excited to continue exploring all the city has to offer.
next_options: The lion continues to live in the city and becomes a beloved member of the community
The lion gets homesick and decides to leave the city to return to the wild
